name: BUserComponent
sample: <BUserComponent labelText='Your label text' hintText='Your hint text' />

infoArray.name: selectedUserId
infoArray.desc: Determines the userId that is currently selected. Sample set [50302]

infoArray.name: selectedUserCode
infoArray.desc: Determines the userCode that is currently selected. Sample set ['matalay','tpmetin']

infoArray.name: labelText
infoArray.desc: The content of the floating label.

infoArray.name: disableSearch
infoArray.desc: If true, the User component will be search disabled.

infoArray.name: multiSelect
infoArray.desc: If true, have more than one choice on BCombobox

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the User component will be disabled.

infoArray.name: isCacheEnabled
infoArray.desc: Determines whether the information will be read from the cache when the information is fetched. Default value is true.

infoArray.name: isServiceUserEnabled
infoArray.desc: Does not bring up the boa service user list. (XTM ,ATM ,Your Corner). Default value is true.

infoArray.name: displayMemberPath
infoArray.desc: Display your chosen column on users component. Default column is 'name'

infoArray.name: sortOption
infoArray.desc: Sort the users. Available options is BUserComponent.SortOption.Code, BUserComponent.SortOption.Name

infoArray.name: isAllOptionIncluded
infoArray.desc: If true an item will push to the first index of the user list. Default is value is false.

infoArray.name: allOptionDescription
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true. Default value is 'Hepsi'

infoArray.name: allOptionValue
infoArray.desc: If isAllOptionIncluded is true. Default value is '-1'

infoArray.name: sortValues(sortOption)
infoArray.desc: Sort the Users. Available options is BUserComponent.SortOption.Code, BUserComponent.SortOption.Name

infoArray.name: onUserSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the user item is selected
